examples.code: var start = new Date(2015, 1, 3); var end = new Date(2015, 2, 6); datepicker.addRange(start, end);
datepicker.on('change', function() { var newDate = datepicker.getDate(); console.log(newDate); });
datepicker.on('close', function() { alert('close'); });

properties.name: showJumpButtons
properties.description: If true, shows jump buttons (next,prev-year in 'date'-Calendar)

properties.name: usageStatistics
properties.description: send hostname to google analytics default value is true

examples.code: var DatePicker = tui.DatePicker; // or require('tui-date-picker'); var calendar = DatePicker.createCalendar('#calendar-wrapper', { language: 'en', showToday: true, showJumpButtons: false, date: new Date(), type: 'date' });

properties.name: usageStatistics
properties.description: send hostname to google analytics default value is true

examples.code: var DatePicker = tui.DatePicker; // or require('tui-date-picker'); var rangepicker = DatePicker.createRangePicker({ startpicker: { input: '#start-input', container: '#start-container' }, endpicker: { input: '#end-input', container: '#end-container' }, type: 'date', format: 'yyyy-MM-dd' selectableRanges: [ [new Date(2017, 3, 1), new Date(2017, 5, 1)], [new Date(2017, 6, 3), new Date(2017, 10, 5)] ] });
datepicker.enable(); datepicker.disable();
datepicker.on('draw', function(evt) { console.log(evt.date); });
datepicker.disable(); datepicker.enable();

items.name: findOverlappedRange(startDate, endDate)
items.description: Returns the first overlapped range from the point or range

params.name: startDate
params.description: Start date to find overlapped range

params.name: endDate
params.description: End date to find overlapped range

examples.code: // 2015-04-13 datepicker.getDate(); // new Date(2015, 3, 13)
var timepicker = this.getTimePicker();

items.name: isDisabled()
items.description: Returns whether the datepicker is disabled

items.name: isOpened()
items.description: Return whether the datepicker is opened or not

examples.code: datepicker.close(); datepicker.isOpened(); // false datepicker.open(); datepicker.isOpened(); // true

items.name: isSelected(date)
items.description: Returns whether the date is selected

examples.code: var DatePicker = tui.DatePicker; // or require('tui-date-picker'); DatePicker.localeTexts['customKey'] = { titles: { // days DD: ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'], // daysShort D: ['Sun', 'Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fir', 'Sat'], // months MMMM: [ 'January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December' ], // monthsShort MMM: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec'] }, titleFormat: 'MMM yyyy', todayFormat: 'D, MMMM dd, yyyy', date: 'Date', time: 'Time' }; var datepicker = new tui.DatePicker('#datepicker-container', { language: 'customKey' });

properties.name: date
properties.description: Initial date. Default - null for no initial date

properties.name: openers
properties.description: Opener button list (example - icon, button, etc.)

properties.name: usageStatistics
properties.description: send hostname to google analytics (default value is true)

examples.code: var DatePicker = tui.DatePicker; // or require('tui-date-picker'); var range1 = [new Date(2015, 2, 1), new Date(2015, 3, 1)]; var range2 = [1465570800000, 1481266182155]; // timestamps var picker1 = new DatePicker('#datepicker-container1', { showAlways: true }); var picker2 = new DatePicker('#datepicker-container2', { showAlways: true, timepicker: true }); var picker3 = new DatePicker('#datepicker-container3', { // There are two supporting types by default - 'en' and 'ko'. // See "{@link DatePicker.localeTexts}" language: 'ko', calendar: { showToday: true }, timepicker: { showMeridiem: true, defaultHour: 13, defaultMinute: 24 }, input: { element: '#datepicker-input', format: 'yyyy년 MM월 dd일 hh:mm A' } type: 'date', date: new Date(2015, 0, 1) // or timestamp. (default: null-(no initial date)) selectableRanges: [range1, range2], openers: ['#opener'] });
datepicker.on('open', function() { alert('open'); });
datepicker.open();

params.name: type
params.description: Range type, If falsy -> Use strict timestamp;

examples.code: var start = new Date(2015, 1, 3); var end = new Date(2015, 2, 6); datepicker.removeRange(start, end);

items.name: setDate(date)
items.description: Set date and then fire 'update' custom event

examples.code: datepicker.setDate(new Date()); // Set today
datepicker.setDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd'); datepicker.setDateFormat('MM-dd, yyyy'); datepicker.setDateFormat('y/M/d'); datepicker.setDateFormat('yy/MM/dd');

items.name: setRanges(ranges)
items.description: Set selectable ranges (prev ranges will be removed)

examples.code: datepicker.setRanges([ [new Date(2017, 0, 1), new Date(2018, 0, 2)], [new Date(2015, 2, 3), new Date(2016, 4, 2)] ]);
datepicker.setType('month');
datepicker.toggle();
